alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baca County through 545 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Campo, or 22 miles south of Springfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Campo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
